name: Cancelled Bills Reinstatement Report
query:
SELECT
    tsi.customer AS Customer,
    tsi.customer_group AS `Customer Group`,
    tsi.status AS Status,
    tsi.custom_mrn AS MRN,
    tsi.custom_bill_no  AS `Bill Number`,
    tsi.posting_date AS `Bill Date`,
    tsi.region AS region ,
    tsi.branch AS Branch,
    tsi.branch_type AS `Branch Type`,
    tsi.entity AS Entity,
    tsi.custom_patient_name AS `Patient Name`,
    tsi.custom_claim_id AS `Claim Id`,
    tsi.total AS `Claim Amount`,
    tpe.paid_amount AS `Settled Amount`,
    tpe.custom_tds_amount AS TDS,
    tpe.custom_disallowed_amount  AS `Disallowed Amount`,
    tpe.reference_no AS UTR
FROM
    `tabSales Invoice` tsi
JOIN
    (SELECT DISTINCT(custom_mrn) AS MRN FROM `tabSales Invoice` WHERE status = 'CANCELLED') cm
    ON tsi.custom_mrn = cm.MRN
LEFT JOIN
    `tabPayment Entry` tpe
    ON tpe.custom_sales_invoice = tsi.name
ORDER BY tsi.custom_mrn , tsi.status ;
